2.55: The outer layer geometric thickness of MT@rGO-4 is 45 ± 4 nm, which suggests that the optical thickness of MT@rGO-4 range from 105 to 124 nm with the TiO2 refractive index of 2.55.

According to equation (1), the optical thickness range from 107 to 122 nm with the TiO2 refractive index of 2.55 after calculation, which means that the MT@rGO-4 composite pearlescent pigment should show silver white color effect as shown in Fig. 8f.
